summary: DT:  2004 MAZDA TRIBUTE.  THE CONSUMER STATED ON AUGUST 27, 2005 WAS HIT BY A DRUNKEN  DRIVER.   DRIVER'S  SIDE WAS TOTALED, AND THE SIDE AIR BAGS DID NOT DEPLOY.  THE CONSUMER WAS CUT BY THE WINDOW GLASS, HE REQUIRED A FEW STITCHES.   A POLICE REPORT WAS TAKEN.  TOOK VEHICLE TO A LOCAL BODY SHOP AND  VEHICLE WAS NOT INSPECTED TO SEE WHY THE AIR BAG DID NOT DEPLOY.  CALLED MAZDA, AND THEY SAID THEY WOULD DOCUMENT IT,  BUT IT WAS UP TO THE INSURANCE COMPANY TO INVESTIGATE THE ACCIDENT.  *AK
